data.title: Boston Bruins release 2012-13 regular season schedule
data.meta_description: The Bruins start the season on the road in Philadelphia and host the Canadiens in their home opener.
data.text:
Days after the announcement of their preseason schedule, the Boston Bruins have released their 2012-13 regular season schedule.

If a work stoppage doesn't delay the start of the season (negotiation meetings haven't even started yet) the Bruins will open on the road on Thursday, Oct. 11 in Philadelphia.

Boston's home opener falls on Thursday, Oct. 18 in midst of a home-and-home series with the Montreal Canadiens.

Other highlights include a day after Thanksgiving Day matinee showdown with the New York Rangers at TD Garden and on Dec. 17, Boston will host the reigning Stanley Cup Champion Los Angeles Kings.

The Bruins travel to Vancouver this year to face the Canucks, Dec. 29 at Rogers Arena.

Scroll down to view the complete schedule. Highlight games are in bold.

To view the complete NHL schedule click here.
